title: Jens Gehlhaar interview/feature
content:
We just posted a rather lengthy interview with Jens Gehlhaar, type designer and creative director at Brand New School in Los Angeles. The article includes a wide survey of Gehlhaar's type designs from the past decade or so, his thoughts on typographic education, and the expatriate experience. Check it out at [http://www.neojaponisme.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064622/http:/www.neojaponisme.com/ "http://www.neojaponisme.com"), a new online publication from Tokyo.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019064622im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jens_main_5890.gif)
author: ilynam

comments.content: Wonderful, Ian! I've been a fan of Gelhaar for a long time and his work is not very well known. Where are the typeface examples?
